snippet: The chairman of the Port Authority has too many troubling conflicts of interest to remain in the post.
abstract: Editorial contends New Jersey Gov Chris Christie will have to undertake major overhaul of the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey in order to make amends for traffic jam at George Washington Bridge; holds restructuring should begin with firing authority chairman David Sampson; says Sampson has conflicts of interest with his law firm Wolff & Samson and has used authority post to advance his professional interests.
lead_paragraph: The chairman of the Port Authority has too many troubling conflicts of interest to remain in the post.
